languages.text:
The Overseer chooses an ally in their line of sight (can be themselves). The cyber-mastiff immediately attempts to run to that ally. If it does not have enough MP, it moves as close to that ally as possible. Upon reaching them, the cyber-mastiff applies {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} to them, and makes a melee area attack against adjacent enemies. The {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} effect lasts until the cyber-mastiff or the targeted ally's wounds drop to 0 or until another order is given.
When used on the Overseer for the first time in combat, the Overseer regains 1 AP.

traits.locale_text:
The Overseer chooses himself or an ally he sees. The Mastiff immediately dashes to this creature. Upon reaching them, the Mastiff makes a powerful melee attack against every enemy around it and applies {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}Protected{/g} to the targeted creature. If they are too far, the Mastiff spends {uip|MP|5955723361094eada17c84c6c9f84476} MP trying to reach them. After that, during its turn, the Mastiff will focus on protecting that ally until one of them has 0 Wounds or until another order is given.
While the Mastiff is near the {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}Protected{/g} ally, it makes a free melee attack against any enemy around the {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}Protected{/g} ally each time that enemy hits the {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}Protected{/g} ally. It’s triggered by both melee and ranged attacks and also corresponding abilities. The Mastiff moves into another cell in the vicinity of the {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}Protected{/g} ally if it's needed to reach the attacker. If the {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}Protected{/g} ally moves, the Mastiff dashes after them as a free reaction, trying to stay close. If the {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}Protected{/g} ally is dropped to 0 Wounds, the Mastiff stays in his cell until given another order.
Applying Protect! on the Overseer for the first time in combat restores 1 AP.

languages.text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} chooses an ally in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} (can be themselves). The cyber-mastiff immediately attempts to run to that ally. If it does not have enough {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, it moves as close to that ally as possible. Upon reaching them, the cyber-mastiff applies {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} to them and makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} against adjacent enemies. The {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} effect lasts until the cyber-mastiff or the targeted ally's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop to 0 or until another order is given.
When used on the Overseer for the first time in combat, the Overseer regains 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Надзиратель{/g} выбирает союзника в зоне {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}видимости{/g} (можно выбрать самого себя). Кибермастиф немедленно бежит к этому союзнику. Если ему не хватает {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}, он подбегает так близко, как может. Оказавшись на соседней клетке, кибермастиф накладывает на союзника эффект {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}под охраной{/g} и совершает {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атаку по площади{/g} против всех врагов на соседних клетках. Союзник остается {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}под охраной{/g}, пока {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} кибермастифа или самого союзника не опустится до 0 или пока не дана новая команда.
Когда эта способность применяется к надзирателю впервые за бой, он восстанавливает 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}görüş hattındaki{/g} bir dost birimi seçer (kendini de seçebilir). Siber mastif, anında o dost birime doğru koşmaya kalkar. Yeterli {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g}'ye sahip değilse o dost birime mümkün olduğunca yaklaşır. Siber mastif, dost birime ulaşmasıyla onda {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}korunan{/g} etkisi oluşturur ve bitişikteki düşmanlara bir {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}alan saldırısı{/g} gerçekleştirir. {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}Korunan{/g} etkisi, siber mastifin veya hedef dost birimin {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı 0'a inene veya başka bir emir verilene dek sürer.
Çatışmada Gözetmen üzerinde ilk kez kullanıldığında Gözetmen, 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g}'sini geri kazanır.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} chooses an ally in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} (can be themselves). The cyber-mastiff immediately attempts to run to that ally. If it does not have enough {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, it moves as close to that ally as possible. Upon reaching them, the cyber-mastiff applies {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} to them and makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} against adjacent enemies. The {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} effect lasts until the cyber-mastiff or the targeted ally's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop to 0 or until another order is given.
When used on the Overseer for the first time in combat, the Overseer regains 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}görüş hattındaki{/g} bir dost birimi seçer (kendini de seçebilir). Siber mastif, anında o dost birime doğru koşmaya kalkar. Yeterli {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP'ye{/g} sahip değilse o dost birime mümkün olduğunca yaklaşır. Siber mastif, dost birime ulaşmasıyla onda {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}korunan{/g} etkisi oluşturur ve bitişikteki düşmanlara bir {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}alan saldırısı{/g} gerçekleştirir. {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}Korunan{/g} etkisi, siber mastifin veya hedef dost birimin {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı 0'a inene veya başka bir emir verilene dek sürer.
Çatışmada Gözetmen üzerinde ilk kez kullanıldığında Gözetmen, 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP'sini{/g} geri kazanır.

Gözetmen, görüş hattındaki bir dost birimi seçer (kendini de seçebilir). Siber mastif, anında o dost birime doğru koşmaya kalkar. Yeterli HP'ye sahip değilse o dost birime mümkün olduğunca yaklaşır. Siber mastif, dost birime ulaşmasıyla onda {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}korunan{/g} etkisi oluşturur ve bitişikteki düşmanlara bir yakın dövüş alan saldırısı gerçekleştirir. {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}Korunan{/g} etkisi, siber mastifin veya hedef dost birimin sağlık puanı 0'a inene veya başka bir emir verilene dek sürer.
Çatışmada Gözetmen üzerinde ilk kez kullanıldığında Gözetmen, 1 EP'sini geri kazanır.

languages.text:
El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} elige un aliado que esté dentro de su {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g} (puede escogerse a sí mismo). El cibermastín intenta correr hacia ese aliado de inmediato. Si no dispone de suficientes {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}, se acerca tanto como puede. Cuando lo alcanza, el cibermastín le aplica el efecto {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protegido{/g} y realiza un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}área{/g} contra los enemigos adyacentes. El efecto {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protegido{/g} dura hasta que las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} del cibermastín o el aliado protegido se reduzcan a 0, o bien hasta que el cibermastín reciba otra orden.
La primera vez que se use con el supervisor durante un combate, este recupera 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} chooses an ally in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} (can be themselves). The cyber-mastiff immediately attempts to run to that ally. If it does not have enough {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, it moves as close to that ally as possible. Upon reaching them, the cyber-mastiff applies {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} to them and makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} against adjacent enemies. The {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} effect lasts until the cyber-mastiff or the targeted ally's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop to 0 or until another order is given.
When used on the Overseer for the first time in combat, the Overseer regains 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
El supervisor elige un aliado que esté dentro de su línea de visión (puede escogerse a sí mismo). El cibermastín intenta correr hacia ese aliado de inmediato. Si no dispone de suficientes PM, se acerca tanto como puede. Cuando lo alcanza, el cibermastín le aplica el efecto {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protegido{/g} y realiza un ataque cuerpo a cuerpo de área contra los enemigos adyacentes. El efecto {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protegido{/g} dura hasta que las heridas del cibermastín o el aliado protegido se reduzcan a 0, o bien hasta que el cibermastín reciba otra orden.
La primera vez que se use con el supervisor durante un combate, este recupera 1 PA.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}选择{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}范围内的一名盟友（可以选择自身），随后生化獒犬会冲向该名盟友。如果生化獒犬{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}不足，则会尽可能地靠近该盟友。当生化獒犬抵达目标身边时，会立刻对该盟友施加{g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}受到守护{/g}效果，同时对所有邻近战人进行{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围{/g}攻击。{g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}受到保护{/g}效果会始终生效，直到生化獒犬或该名盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}降为0，或生化獒犬收到其他指令为止。
当此能力在战斗中首次对监察官使用时，监察官恢复1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} chooses an ally in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} (can be themselves). The cyber-mastiff immediately attempts to run to that ally. If it does not have enough {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, it moves as close to that ally as possible. Upon reaching them, the cyber-mastiff applies {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} to them and makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} against adjacent enemies. The {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} effect lasts until the cyber-mastiff or the targeted ally's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop to 0 or until another order is given.
When used on the Overseer for the first time in combat, the Overseer regains 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
监察官选择视线范围内的一名盟友（可以选择自身），随后生化獒犬会冲向该名盟友。如果生化獒犬移动点数不足，则会尽可能地靠近该盟友。当生化獒犬抵达目标身边时，会立刻对该盟友施加{g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}受到守护{/g}效果，同时对所有邻近敌人进行近战范围攻击。{g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}受到保护{/g}效果会始终生效，直到生化獒犬或该名盟友的生命值降为0，或生化獒犬收到其他指令为止。
当此能力在战斗中首次对监察官使用时，监察官恢复1点行动点数。

languages.text:
Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufseher{/g} wählt einen Gegner in seinem {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtfeld{/g} aus. Der Cyber-Mastiff stürzt sich nun sofort auf diesen Gegner. Hat er dazu nicht genügend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}, nähert er sich dem Gegner so weit wie möglich. Erreicht der Cyber-Mastiff den Verbündeten, belegt er ihn mit {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}Beschützt{/g} und attackiert Gegner auf {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}angrenzenden Feldern{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g}. Der Effekt {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}Beschützt{/g} endet, wenn die {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} des Cyber-Mastiff oder des anvisierten Verbündeten auf 0 sinken oder ein anderer Befehl erteilt wird.
Wirkt der Effekt im Kampf erstmals auf den Aufseher, regeneriert dieser 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} chooses an ally in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} (can be themselves). The cyber-mastiff immediately attempts to run to that ally. If it does not have enough {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, it moves as close to that ally as possible. Upon reaching them, the cyber-mastiff applies {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} to them and makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} against adjacent enemies. The {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} effect lasts until the cyber-mastiff or the targeted ally's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop to 0 or until another order is given.
When used on the Overseer for the first time in combat, the Overseer regains 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Der Aufseher wählt einen Gegner in seinem Blickfeld aus. Der Cyber-Mastiff stürzt sich nun sofort auf diesen Gegner. Hat er dazu nicht genügend BP, nähert er sich dem Gegner so weit wie möglich. Erreicht der Cyber-Mastiff den Verbündeten, belegt er ihn mit {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}Beschützt{/g} und attackiert Gegner auf angrenzenden Feldern mit einem Nahkampfangriff. Der Effekt {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}Beschützt{/g} endet, wenn die Wunden des Cyber-Mastiff oder des anvisierten Verbündeten auf 0 sinken oder ein anderer Befehl erteilt wird.
Wirkt der Effekt im Kampf erstmals auf den Aufseher, regeneriert dieser 1 AP.

languages.text:
Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} désigne un allié dans sa {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g} (incluant lui-même) que le cyber-mastiff tente immédiatement de rejoindre. S'il n'a pas assez de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}, il se contente de se rapprocher autant que possible. Lorsqu'il atteint l'allié, le cyber-mastiff lui applique l'effet {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}Protection{/g} et déclenche une {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaque de zone{/g} en {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g} contre les ennemis adjacents. L'effet {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}Protection{/g} dure jusqu'à ce que les {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} du cyber-mastiff ou de l'allié ciblé tombent à 0, ou jusqu'à ce que le cyber-mastiff reçoive un nouvel ordre.
Lorsque la capacité est utilisée sur le surveillant pour la première fois au cours d'un combat, le surveillant récupère 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} chooses an ally in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} (can be themselves). The cyber-mastiff immediately attempts to run to that ally. If it does not have enough {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, it moves as close to that ally as possible. Upon reaching them, the cyber-mastiff applies {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} to them and makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} against adjacent enemies. The {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} effect lasts until the cyber-mastiff or the targeted ally's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop to 0 or until another order is given.
When used on the Overseer for the first time in combat, the Overseer regains 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Le surveillant désigne un allié dans sa ligne de mire (incluant lui-même) que le cyber-mastiff tente immédiatement de rejoindre. S'il n'a pas assez de PD, il se contente de se rapprocher autant que possible. Lorsqu'il atteint l'allié, le cyber-mastiff lui applique l'effet {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}Protection{/g} et déclenche une attaque de zone en mêlée contre les ennemis adjacents. L'effet {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}Protection{/g} dure jusqu'à ce que les blessures du cyber-mastiff ou de l'allié ciblé tombent à 0, ou jusqu'à ce que le cyber-mastiff reçoive un nouvel ordre.
Lorsque la capacité est utilisée sur le surveillant pour la première fois au cours d'un combat, le surveillant récupère 1 PA.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督者{/g}は、{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視線{/g}の中にいる味方を選択する（自身も選択可能）。サイバーマスチフは、即座にその味方に向かって走る。十分な{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}がない場合、可能な限りその味方に近づくように移動する。味方に到達すると、サイバーマスチフはその味方に{g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}保護{/g}を与え、隣接する敵に対して{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲{/g}攻撃を行う。{g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}保護{/g}効果は、サイバーマスチフまたはターゲットの味方の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}が0になるか、別の命令が与えられるまで継続する。
戦闘で初めて監督者に使用される場合、監督者は1{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を回復する。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} chooses an ally in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} (can be themselves). The cyber-mastiff immediately attempts to run to that ally. If it does not have enough {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, it moves as close to that ally as possible. Upon reaching them, the cyber-mastiff applies {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} to them and makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} against adjacent enemies. The {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} effect lasts until the cyber-mastiff or the targeted ally's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop to 0 or until another order is given.
When used on the Overseer for the first time in combat, the Overseer regains 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
監督者は、視線の中にいる味方を選択する（自身も選択可能）。サイバーマスチフは、即座にその味方に向かって走る。十分なMPがない場合、可能な限りその味方に近づくように移動する。味方に到達すると、サイバーマスチフはその味方に{g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}保護{/g}を与え、隣接する敵に対して近接範囲攻撃を行い、ダメージが+50%増加する。{g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}保護{/g}効果は、サイバーマスチフまたはターゲットの味方の傷が0になるか、別の命令が与えられるまで継続する。
戦闘で初めて監督者に使用される場合、監督者は1APを回復する。

監督者は、視線の中にいる味方を選択する（自身も選択可能）。サイバーマスチフは、即座にその味方に向かって走る。十分なMPがない場合、可能な限りその味方に近づくように移動する。味方に到達すると、サイバーマスチフはその味方に{g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}保護{/g}を与え、隣接する敵に対して近接範囲攻撃を行い、ダメージが+50%増加する。{g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}保護{/g}効果は、サイバーマスチフまたはターゲットの味方の傷が0になるか、別の命令が与えられるまで継続する。
戦闘で初めて監督者に使用される場合、監督者は1APを回復する。

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Надзиратель{/g} выбирает союзника в зоне {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}видимости{/g} (можно выбрать самого себя). Кибермастиф немедленно бежит к этому союзнику. Если ему не хватает {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}, он подбегает так близко, как может. Оказавшись на соседней клетке, кибермастиф накладывает на союзника эффект {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}под охраной{/g} и совершает {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атаку по площади{/g} против всех врагов на соседних клетках. Союзник остается {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}под охраной{/g}, пока {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} кибермастифа или самого союзника не опустится до 0 или пока не дана новая команда.
Когда эта способность применяется к надзирателю впервые за бой, он восстанавливает 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} chooses an ally in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} (can be themselves). The cyber-mastiff immediately attempts to run to that ally. If it does not have enough {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, it moves as close to that ally as possible. Upon reaching them, the cyber-mastiff applies {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} to them and makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} against adjacent enemies. The {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} effect lasts until the cyber-mastiff or the targeted ally's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop to 0 or until another order is given.
When used on the Overseer for the first time in combat, the Overseer regains 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Надзиратель выбирает союзника в зоне видимости (можно выбрать самого себя). Кибермастиф немедленно бежит к этому союзнику. Если ему не хватает ОП, он подбегает так близко, как может. Оказавшись на соседней клетке, кибермастиф накладывает на союзника эффект {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}под охраной{/g} и совершает атаку по площади против всех врагов на соседних клетках. Союзник остается {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}под охраной{/g}, пока здоровье кибермастифа или самого союзника не опустится до 0 или пока не дана новая команда.
Когда эта способность применяется к надзирателю впервые за бой, он восстанавливает 1 ОД.

Надзиратель выбирает союзника в зоне видимости (можно выбрать самого себя). Кибермастиф немедленно бежит к этому союзнику. Если ему не хватает ОП, он подбегает так близко, как может. Оказавшись на соседней клетке, кибермастиф накладывает на союзника эффект {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}под охраной{/g} и совершает атаку по площади против всех врагов на соседних клетках. Союзник остается {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}под охраной{/g}, пока здоровье кибермастифа или самого союзника не опустится до 0 или пока не дана новая команда.
Когда эта способность применяется к надзирателю впервые за бой, он восстанавливает 1 ОД.
